original_title: Grade 5 Scholarship exam results in 40 days
original_body_lines: The Commissioner General of Examinations, Amith Jayasundara says that the results of the Grade 5 Scholarship Examination held today (15), is expected to be released in 40 days.
This year’s Grade 5 Scholarship exams was held in 2,849 centers with the participation of 323,879 students this morning.
